name: Matris
description: Matris is an easy to play but challenging logic puzzle game for everyone - casual and hardcore gamers.Relax in Puzzle Mode or fight for the High Score in Combo Mode and Time Attack. Play custom levels or create your own thanks to Level Editor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 1.2 GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: And just when I thought that there ain't no puzzle game/arcade game that could teach the old dog some new tricks...  Matris is a dynamic puzzle game that bears resemblance to Lumines and Tetris. The player task is to fill the map/matrix with tretromino-like blocks, provided by the AI. What sounds easy to learn, seems difficult to master - and that learning curve is the main motor for neverending fun of Matris. Lots of different modifications and built-in level editor asures the player that no matter how much he'd play, there's still an awful lot to discover.  Definitely recomended for all Lumines and Tetris enthusiasts, but also everybody that likes to challenge themselves!

Fun puzzle game. Looks like tetris a little but actually it is somethign different :) Lets say tetris reinvented? Might be a bomb. Seems its leveled up pretty good and everything runs smooth. I like puzzle games so this one was cool for me.
This game is showing two things (or just one, who cares): Tetris is immortal AND it could be inspiration for something fresh and unique. If you like logical game with simple rules, buy it.
Entertainging game, with really cool music. If You are tetris fan, You should totally try it, if You aren't You may like it ;)
